賽六: (さいろく) - kid/brat; Edo term used to debase people from Kansai

贅する: (ぜいする) - to say more than necessary
贅六: (ぜえろく) - Edo term used to debase people from Kansai

贅沢三昧: (ぜいたくざんまい) - (yoji) indulging in every possible luxury

赤あざ: (あかあざ) - red birthmark (esp. a hemangioma)
